title: Shalom

lyrics.text:
Shalom chaverim, shalom chaverim,
Shalom, shalom.
Lehitraot, lehitraot,
shalom, shalom.

Farewell, dear friends, stay safe, dear friends,
have peace, have peace.
We'll see you again, we'll see you again,
have peace, have peace.
